name: Oh, My Aching Back (aka Archie's Aching Back)
Gloria's Pregnancy (aka Gloria Has a Belly Full)
Mike's Hippie Friends Come to Visit
Archie is Worried About His Job
Edith's Accident
summary: As she is walking out of the grocery store, Edith accidently dents an unattended car in the parking lot with a can of peaches. However, what infuriates Archie the most is how Edith leaves her contact information so she can pay for the damage caused. As a result, Archie and Mike get into an argument over how honest people are in the world.

name: Archie in the Hospital (aka Archie Goes to the Hospital)
We're Still Having a Heat Wave
Black is the Color of My True Love's Wig
Mike and Gloria Mix it Up
The Bunkers and Inflation (2) (aka Archie Underfoot)
The Bunkers and Inflation (3) (aka Edith the Job Hunter)
The Bunkers and Inflation (4) (aka Archie's Raise)
George and Archie Make a Deal
The Best of All in the Family
The Baby Contest
summary: After getting into an argument with Barney over who has the cuter grandchild, Archie decides to enter his grandson into a local paper's cute baby contest, despite Mike and Gloria's objections.

name: Gloria's False Alarm
summary: After experiencing several symptoms of pregnancy, Gloria urges Mike to get a vasectomy. However, while he is having that procedure done, she gets news that it was just a false alarm.

name: The Draft Dodger
summary: It's Christmas and Edith. Archie, Gloria, and Mike are hosting Archie's friend Pinky for dinner. Things soon get tense when David, an old friend of Mike's unexpectedly drops by. When David lets it slip that he's a draft dodger, an enraged Archie attempts to kick him out of the house, only to be stopped by an impassioned plea to let him stay by Pinky, because it's what his son, who was killed in action, would have wanted.

name: Archie's Chair
summary: When Mike accidently breaks Archie's favorite chair panicked Edith, Gloria, and Mike attempt to get it fixed before Archie gets home. However, while enroute to the repair shop, the chair gets thrown away and eventually picked up and put in an art exhibit.

name: The Joys of Sex
summary: When Gloria finds Edith reading a book on how to spice up her sex life, she urges Mike to have a talk with Archie on how to spice up things in his marriage.

name: Archie's Bitter Pill (2) (aka Archie's Road Back)
Archie and the KKK (1)
summary: A power outage and reports of looting in the city prompt Mike to write a letter to the editor about how greedy governments do the same in the name of free enterprise. At the bar, Archie vents his frustrations about how Mike always argues his point and doesn't see things his way. Two men - who have been listening in - approach Archie and suggest that he come to a meeting of the Kweens Kouncil of Krusaders (a chapter of the Klu Klux Klan), where they will come up with a more severe way of "teaching" Mike a lesson.
